All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ComponentFactory
Interface for component factories that are responsible for initializing components.
CreateFactories
Class that creates and initializes the factories.
DeltaTimeIncrementStrategy
Class that represents a time increment strategy based on the parameter delta.
DiscreteStochasticSimulation
Class that represents ??.
DiscreteStochasticSimulationFactory
Factory class to create and initialize the discrete stochastic simulation components.
EpidemicStrategy
Class that represents a time increment strategy based on the epidemic event.
Event
Abstract class representing an event.
EventDeath
Class that represents a death event.
EventManager
Interface that defines methods for managing events.
EventMutation
Class that represents a mutation event.
EventReproduction
Class that represents a reproduction event.
EvolutionaryProgramming
Class that represents ??.
EvolutionaryProgrammingFactory
Factory class to create and initialize the evolutionary programming components.
IEv
Interface that lets the Evolutionary Programming package schedule events and lets the Discrete Stochastic Simulation simulate events.
Individual
Class that represents an individual.
IndividualSolution
Class that represents an individual solution for patrol allocation.
Main
The main class responsible for starting the simulation.
MuTimeIncrementStrategy
Class that represents a time increment strategy based on the parameter mu.
PatrolAllocation
Class that handles the initialization and setup of the patrol allocation problem.
PatrolAllocationFactory
Factory class to initialize the PatrolAllocation components.
PEC
The PEC (Pending Event Container) class represents a queue of pending events in a discrete stochastic simulation.
Population
Class that represents a population of individuals.
RhoTimeIncrementStrategy
Class that represents a time increment strategy based on the parameter rho.
Solution
Interface that represents a solution.
TimeIncrement
Abstract class representing a time increment strategy.
TimeIncrementStrategy
Interface that lets the Evolutionary Programming package acknowledge an upcoming event's simulation time.
